DOC.brief_summary: To investigate change HRV time spontaneous episode ventricular tachyarrhythmia .
DOC.brief_title: Change Heart Rate Variability Prior Tachyarrhythmia ICD Implanted Patients
DOC.criteria: S/P lexos VR/T , DR/T implantation Signed patient inform consent CAF Life expectancy < 6 month Impending heart transplant Persistent recur tachycardia Rhythm disturbances preclude meaningful HRV analysis Participation another study .
